verses.verse: A Song <S%H7892><s%> or Psalm <S%H4210><s%> of David. <S%H1732><s%> O god, <S%H430><s%> my heart <S%H3820><s%> is fixed; <S%H3559><s%> I will sing <S%H7891><s%> and give praise, <S%H2167><s%> even <S%H637><s%> with my glory. <S%H3519><s%>
Awake, <S%H5782><s%> psaltery <S%H5035><s%> and harp: <S%H3658><s%> I myself will awake <S%H5782><s%> early. <S%H7837><s%>
I will praise <S%H3034><s%> you, O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> among the people: <S%H5971><s%> and I will sing <S%H2167><s%> praises to you among the nations. <S%H3816><s%>
For your mercy <S%H2617><s%> is great <S%H1419><s%> above <S%H5921><s%> the heavens: <S%H8064><s%> and your truth <S%H571><s%> reaches to the clouds. <S%H7834><s%>
Be you exalted, <S%H7311><s%> O God, <S%H430><s%> above <S%H5921><s%> the heavens: <S%H8064><s%> and your glory <S%H3519><s%> above <S%H5921><s%> all the earth; <S%H776><s%>
That your beloved <S%H3039><s%> may be delivered: <S%H2502><s%> save <S%H3467><s%> with your right <S%H3225><s%> hand, <S%H3225><s%> and answer <S%H6030><s%> me.

God <S%H430><s%> has spoken <S%H1696><s%> in his holiness; <S%H6944><s%> I will rejoice, <S%H5937><s%> I will divide <S%H2505><s%> Shechem, <S%H7927><s%> and mete <S%H4058><s%> out the valley <S%H6010><s%> of Succoth. <S%H5523><s%>
Gilead <S%H1568><s%> is mine; Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> is mine; Ephraim <S%H669><s%> also is the strength <S%H4581><s%> of my head; <S%H7218><s%> Judah <S%H3063><s%> is my lawgiver; <S%H2710><s%>

Moab <S%H4124><s%> is my wash pot; <S%H5518><s%> <S%H7366><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> Edom <S%H123><s%> will I cast <S%H7993><s%> out my shoe; <S%H5275><s%> over Philistia <S%H6429><s%> will I triumph. <S%H7321><s%>
Who <S%H4310><s%> will bring <S%H2986><s%> me into the strong <S%H4013><s%> city? <S%H5892><s%> who <S%H4310><s%> will lead <S%H5148><s%> me into <S%H5704><s%> Edom? <S%H123><s%>
Will not you, O God, <S%H430><s%> who have cast <S%H2186><s%> us off? and will not you, O God, <S%H430><s%> go <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> with our hosts? <S%H6635><s%>
Give <S%H3051><s%> us help <S%H5833><s%> from trouble: <S%H6862><s%> for vain <S%H7723><s%> is the help <S%H8668><s%> of man. <S%H120><s%>
Through God <S%H430><s%> we shall do <S%H6213><s%> valiantly: <S%H2428><s%> for he it is that shall tread <S%H947><s%> down our enemies. <S%H6862><s%>
